text: @AnthemRespect @realDonaldTrump OK, the Navy is years ahead of civilian medicine. My husband was a corpsman. They used HydroxyChloroquine for years-no problems! Fauci and others need to stop denying it's use to fight Coronavirus. Too many "new" drugs are used for different ailments-other than the intended use.
